# SEQ19 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 19 focuses on paths and squares

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl120, apl121, apl122, apl123, apl124, apl125, apl126, apl127, apl128, apl129, apl130, apl131

## Emergent Phenomena
Pedestrian circulation that creates opportunities for encounter and makes spaces feel alive

## Overview
This sequence contains 12 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
